goal.ch: 學習如何分析土木工程相關固體力學領域之各類問題，瞭解材料或結構實際力學行為之物理現象，以為日後土木工程設計之基礎。
goal.en:
"1. Study the relationships between the external loads applied to a deformable body and the intensity of internal 
forces acting within the body. 
2. The methods for analyzing the deformations of the body when it is subjected to external forces."

outline.ch:
1              Stress
2  Strain
3 Mechanical properties of Materials
4 Axial loading
5 Torsion
6 Pure bending
7 Transverse loading
8 Combined loading
9 Transformation of stress and strain
10 Design of beams and shafts
11 Deflection of beams
12 Columns
outline.en:
1              Stress
2  Strain
3 Mechanical properties of Materials
4 Axial loading
5 Torsion
6 Pure bending
7 Transverse loading
8 Combined loading
9 Transformation of stress and strain
10 Design of beams and shafts
11 Deflection of beams
12 Columns

textbook.ch: "Mechanics of Materials by R. C. Hibbeler (10th Edition, Taiwan Adapted Version)"
textbook.en: "Mechanics of Materials by R. C. Hibbeler (10th Edition, Taiwan Adapted Version)"

gradMethod.ch:
"第一次考試 23%             
第二次考試 23%
第三次考試 24%
第四次考試 25%
平時成績 15%  (指定習題5%，小考 5%，點名 5%)"
gradMethod.en:
"First Exam  23%             
Second Exam  23%
Third Exam  24%
Fourth Exam  25%
Class Performance 15%  (Homework 5%，Quiz 5%，roll call 5%)"

flexDiscription.ch: 此2週之彈性教學，將以專題或補救教學等學習方式進行。
flexDiscription.en: These two weeks of flexible teaching schedule, which will be conducted in the form of project or remedial teaching and other learning methods.

專業基礎學科


、


工程實務與應用


、


力學及結構工程
domain.en:

ch.competencies: 運用數學、科學及工程知識之能力
設計、執行實驗及分析之能力
土木工程設計及監造之能力
計畫管理、人際溝通，專業表達與撰寫之能力
團隊合作與整合之能力
主動發掘、分析及解決問題之能力
國際觀、吸收新知以及自我學習之能力
工程技術與生態環境之互動
工程倫理並善盡社會責任，並具有人文素養及服務人群之精神

en.competencies: The Ability of Using Math, Science, and Engineering Knowledge
The Ability of Implementing Practical Engineering
The Ability of Designing, Conducting, and Analyzing  Experiments
The Ability in Design and Supervision of Civil Engineering Projects
The Ability of Projet Management, Interpersonal Communication, Technical  Experssiveness and Writing
The Ability of Teamwork and Integration
The Ability of Finding, Analzing, and Solving Problems Actively
The Ability of Absorbing New Information, International Perspective and Self-Learning
Interaction Between Technology and the Environment/Ecology
Engineering Ethics and Taking Social Responsibility, Having Humanity Disposition and the Spirit to Serve the Public

ch: 系所:限土木工程學系。年級:限二年級。班別:限B。指定課程:必須先修CI1005。且檢定指定課程平均成績達50分以上。
系所:限土木工程學系。年級:限三年級、四年級。指定課程:必須先修CI1005。且檢定指定課程平均成績達50分以上。
系所:限工學院學士班。指定課程:必須先修CI1005。且檢定指定課程平均成績達50分以上。
en: Department:Department of Civil Engineering only.Year:Second Year only.Class:B only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementCI1005 only.With an average of 50 or above for Required Subjects.

Department:Department of Civil Engineering only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementCI1005 only.With an average of 50 or above for Required Subjects.
